1: Ri ajawarem rech ri kaj kajunumataj kukꞌ ri e lajuj alitomabꞌ ri man e kꞌulan taj, xkikꞌam bꞌik ri kilampara, xebꞌe chukꞌulaxik ri jiꞌatz.
2: E jobꞌ chike ri alitomabꞌ maj ketaꞌmabꞌal, ri e jobꞌ chik kꞌo ketaꞌmabꞌal.
3: Ri alitomabꞌ ri maj ketaꞌmabꞌal xkikꞌam bꞌik ri kilampara, man nim ta kꞌut ri kaceite xkikꞌam bꞌik.
4: Xuqujeꞌ ri alitomabꞌ ri kꞌo ketaꞌmabꞌal xkikꞌam bꞌik ri kilampara rachiꞌl ri kaceite.
5: Ri jiꞌatz xbꞌeyetaj bꞌik rumal riꞌ xewar konojel ri alitomabꞌ.
6: Nikꞌaj aqꞌabꞌ xtataj jun chꞌabꞌal kubꞌij: “¡Xpe le jiꞌatz, chixel loq chukꞌamawaꞌxik!”
7: Jeriꞌ konojel ri alitomabꞌ xekꞌastajik, xoꞌk chusukꞌumaxik ri kilamparas.
8: Ri alitomabꞌ ri maj ketaꞌmabꞌal xkibꞌij chike ri alitomabꞌ ri kꞌo ketaꞌmabꞌal: “Chiya jubꞌiqꞌ qe ri iwaceite rech man kechup ta ri qalámparas.”
9: Ri alitomabꞌ ri kꞌo ketaꞌmabꞌal xkibꞌij: “Man kaqaya taj, we kaqaya iwe man kubꞌan ta chilaꞌ chaqe uj, are utz we kiꞌloqꞌo iwe pa ri kꞌayibꞌal aceite.”
10: Are e bꞌenaq chuloqꞌik ri aceite, xopan ri jiꞌatz. Ri alitomabꞌ ri kayeꞌm apanoq xok rukꞌ pa ri nimaqꞌij rech kꞌulanem, kꞌa te riꞌ xtzꞌapiꞌk ri uchiꞌ ja.
11: Kꞌa te riꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri nikꞌaj alitomabꞌ chik, xkibꞌij: “¡Ajawxel, Ajawxel, jaqa la ri uchiꞌ ja chiqawach!”
12: Ri Ajawxel xubꞌij: “Man kinjaq taj, man wetaꞌm taj iwach.”
13: Rumal riꞌ chixkꞌasloq rumal man iwetaꞌm taj ri qꞌotaj xuqujeꞌ ri qꞌij are jewaꞌ kakꞌulmatajik.
14: Ri ajawarem rech ri Dios kajunumataj rukꞌ jun achi, are xeꞌ pa ri utaqkil xuꞌsikꞌij ri e patanil rech xuchilibꞌej kanoq ri urajil chike.
15: Che ri jun xuya jobꞌ mil qꞌana pwaq, che ri jun chik xuya kebꞌ mil, che ri jun chik xuya jun mil, jaljoj xubꞌan chuyaꞌik ri pwaq chike rumal cher are xrilo ri ketaꞌmabꞌal chuchajixik, kꞌa te riꞌ xeꞌ pa ri utaqkil.
16: Ri patanijel ri xukꞌamawaꞌj jobꞌ mil xchakun rukꞌ ri pwaq, xuchꞌek chi jun jobꞌ mil chirij.
17: Je xuqujeꞌ ri xukꞌamawaꞌj kebꞌ mil xuchꞌek chik jun kebꞌ mil chik chirij.
18: Are kꞌu ri achi ri xukꞌamawaꞌj jun mil xukꞌot jun jul pa ri ulew, kꞌa te riꞌ xrawaj kanoq ri urajil ri rajaw.
19: Are xikꞌow sibꞌalaj kꞌi qꞌij, ri patrón xtzalij loq, xuta ri kwenta chike ri e patanijel taq rech.
20: Ri patanijel ri xukꞌamawaꞌj jobꞌ mil pwaq, xukꞌam chi bꞌik ri jun mil ri xuchꞌeko, xubꞌij che ri patrón, Ajawxel lal xya la kanoq jobꞌ mil pwaq chwe, chilampe la xinchꞌek chi lajuj mil chirij le xya la kanoq chwe.
21: Ri upatrón xubꞌij che: Utz ri xabꞌano, utz laj ajchak, sukꞌ ri awanimaꞌ. Utz xabꞌano rukꞌ ri nitzꞌ ri xinya chawe rumal riꞌ kibꞌan chawe chi kachajij na nima taq jastaq. Chatan loq chatkiꞌkotoq rukꞌ ri awajaw.
22: Xopan xuqujeꞌ ri achi ri xukꞌamawaꞌj kebꞌ mil pwaq xubꞌij che ri patrón. Ajawxel lal xya la kanoq kebꞌ mil pwaq chwe, chilampe la xinchꞌek chi kebꞌ mil pwaq chirij le xya la kanoq chwe.
23: Ri patrón xubꞌij che: “Utz ri xabꞌano, utz laj ajchak, sukꞌ awanimaꞌ, utz xabꞌano rukꞌ ri nitzꞌ ri xinya chawe, kinbꞌan na chi kabꞌan awe puꞌwiꞌ nim jastaq. Chatan loq, chatkiꞌkot pa ri kiꞌkotemal rech ri awajaw.”
24: Kꞌa te riꞌ xopan ri achi ri xukꞌamawaꞌj mil pwaq. Xubꞌij: “Ajawxel, in wetaꞌm chi sibꞌalaj ko ri animaꞌ la, are kaj la kabꞌan la yakoj cho ri ulew jawjeꞌ ri man xtikoꞌnij ta wi la, xuqujeꞌ are kaj la kakꞌamawaꞌj la uwach ri tikoꞌn jawjeꞌ ri man xtikoꞌnij ta wi la.
25: Rumal riꞌ xinxiꞌj wibꞌ, xinmuq ri rajil la pa ri ulew. Riꞌ xinkꞌam loq, are waꞌ ri rajil la.”
26: Ri upatrón xubꞌij che: “At jun itzel ajchak, at saqꞌor. Xaq jeriꞌ awetaꞌm chi kinyakoꞌnijik jawjeꞌ ri man xintikoꞌnij ta wi, xuqujeꞌ kikꞌamawaꞌj we ri uwach ri tikoꞌn jawjeꞌ ri man xintikoꞌnij ta wi.
27: Are utz we ta xaya ri nurajil jawjeꞌ kayak wi ri pwaq rech kuchꞌek ral, rech are xintzalij loq xaya ta apanoq ri chꞌekoj chwe.”
28: Ri patrón xubꞌij chike ri nikꞌaj ajchakibꞌ chik: “Chimaja ri jun mil pwaq che, chiya che ri kꞌo lajuj mil rukꞌ.
29: Jeriꞌ, rumal cher ri nim kꞌo rukꞌ kayaꞌtaj na nim che, rech sibꞌalaj nim kakꞌojiꞌ na rukꞌ. Are kꞌu ri maj kꞌo rukꞌ kamaj na che ri kꞌisbꞌal jastaq ri kꞌo rukꞌ.
30: We itzel ajchak riꞌ, chiwesaj bꞌik, chikꞌyaqa bꞌik pa ri qꞌequꞌmal, jawjeꞌ kꞌo wi na oqꞌej xuqujeꞌ qutꞌutꞌem ware.”
31: Ri uKꞌojol ri Achi are kape pa ri ujuluwem, rachiꞌl ri angelibꞌ, katꞌuyiꞌ na pa ri utem ri kajuluwik.
32: Konojel ri winaq rech ri uwachulew kakimulij na kibꞌ choch, ri uKꞌojol ri Achi kuꞌqꞌat na nikꞌaj chike ri nikꞌaj chik, jacha ri kubꞌan ri jun ajyuqꞌ kuꞌqꞌat ri chij chike ri e kꞌisikꞌ.
33: Kuꞌya na ri chij pa ri uwiqiqꞌabꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri kꞌisikꞌ pa ri umox.
34: Ri Taqanel kubꞌij na chike ri e kꞌo pa ri uwiqiqꞌabꞌ: “Chixpetoq, ri ix ri ixutewechiꞌm ri nuTat, chikꞌamawaꞌj ri iwechabꞌal, are waꞌ ri ajawarem ri chiꞌtal loq chiꞌwe are majaꞌ katiktaj loq ri uwachulew.
35: Jeriꞌ rumal are xinnumik, xiya nuwa, are xchaqiꞌj nuchiꞌ, xiya nujoron, are xinwaꞌkatik xiya kanoq nukꞌolibꞌal jawjeꞌ kinkanaj wi.
36: Are xajawataj watzꞌyaq, xiya watzꞌyaq, are xinyawajik, xinichajij, are xintzꞌapiꞌk pa cheꞌ xinisolij.”
37: Ri sukꞌ taq winaq kakibꞌij na: “Ajawxel, ¿jampaꞌ xqaya wa la are xnum la? ¿Jampaꞌ xqaya joron la are xchaqiꞌj chiꞌ la?
38: ¿Jampaꞌ xqaya kꞌolibꞌal la are xwaꞌkat la o jampaꞌ xqaya atzꞌyaq la are xajawataj che la?
39: ¿Jampaꞌ xqasolij la are lal yawabꞌ o are xtzꞌapiꞌk la pa cheꞌ?”
40: Ri Taqanel kubꞌij na chike: “Qas tzij kinbꞌij chiꞌwe, ronojel ri xibꞌano chike ri e wachalal pune are ri kꞌin laj nitzꞌ, chwe in xibꞌan wi.”
41: Kꞌa te riꞌ kubꞌij na chike ri e kꞌo pa ri umox: “Chixel wukꞌ itzel taq winaq, jix pa ri tyoꞌnel qꞌaqꞌ ri maj ukꞌisik, are riꞌ ukꞌolibꞌal ri Itzel xuqujeꞌ ri uꞌtaqoꞌn.
42: Jeriꞌ rumal cher man xiya ta nuwa are xinnumik, man xiya ta nujoron are xchaqiꞌj nuchiꞌ.
43: Are xinwaꞌkatik man xiya ta nukꞌolibꞌal jawjeꞌ kinkanaj wi, man xiya ta watzꞌyaq are xajawataj chwe, are xinyawajik xuqujeꞌ xintzꞌapiꞌk pa che man xinisolij taj.”
44: Ri winaq riꞌ kakibꞌij na che: “Ajawxel, ¿jampaꞌ man xqatoꞌta la are xnum la, jampaꞌ xchaqiꞌj chiꞌ la, jampaꞌ xwaꞌkat la, jampaꞌ xajawataj atzꞌyaq la, jampaꞌ xyawaj la o xtzꞌapiꞌ la pa cheꞌ?”
45: Ri Ajawxel kubꞌij na: “Qas tzij kinbꞌij ronojel ri man xibꞌan taj kukꞌ ri e wachalal pune aꞌreꞌ alaj taq e nitzꞌ, chwe in riꞌ xibꞌan wi.
46: Ri itzel taq winaq kebꞌe na pa ri jun alik kꞌaxkꞌolal are kꞌu ri sukꞌ taq winaq kebꞌe na pa ri jun alik kꞌaslemal.”
